Package ecosystem.Animal

Class Rabbit

java.lang.Object
ecosystem.Animal.Animal
ecosystem.Animal.Rabbit
All Implemented Interfaces:
Fleeable, Moveable, Serializable, Cloneable
public class Rabbit extends Animal implements Fleeable
Rabbit class, extended from Animal. Different to Wolf class.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • start

      public void start()
      Method used to start a Rabbit's thread. It checks if the Rabbit is alive, checks if it has to starve to death, looks for wolves in surrounding area, hunts for plants, moves.
